name: Mishigi: Love & War (Demo)
description:
Prologue - A Fateful Night

It has been 15 years since Princess Violet Baioretto fled her home from the evil demon king, Lord Rakakurah... Now, she seeks revenge. Begin the adventure as Violet in this fantasy otome visual novel (with PLENTY hotties to choose from!) and decide who will stand by you as your friend... or foe... or maybe, something more?

Main game to be released in 2023!
